com.nexmo.client

Interface NexmoMemberSummary

  • All Superinterfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    NexmoMember

    public interface NexmoMemberSummary
extends java.io.Serializable, android.os.Parcelable
    An individual conversation member.

    Use this class to retrieve information about a NexmoMemberSummary and display member info.

    A NexmoMemberSummary can be kicked from a conversation: 

         conversation.kick(memberId, new NexmoIRequestListener() {
         @Override
         public void onSuccess() {
              // Update the application UI here if needed.
         }
         @Override
         public void onError(NexmoAPIError error) {
              // Update the application UI here if needed.
         }
    });
